data.actual_result: Spellcheck doesn't trigger until you click outside of the text field inside of the modal
data.expected_result: Spellcheck correctly triggering upon detecting the misspelled word without needing to click outside of the text field
data.short_description: Spellcheck not correctly triggering in the Quick Switcher
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the Quick Switcher (ctrl+k) - Type a misspelled word into the text field & observe the lack of Spellcheck initially - Click outside of the text field of the modal and observe Spellcheck suddenly triggering
